data.name: Innkeeper VR
data.description:
The tavern is in need of a new innkeeper! Be the one to answer this call! Just imagine...

You are the master of your tavern destiny! Serve customers with a smile, rent out cozy rooms, break up fights, or simply toss out anyone who rubs you the wrong way – the choice is yours! Feel the rush as you navigate the chaos and excitement of managing a bustling tavern.

Assemble your dream team by hiring a talented bard to keep the atmosphere lively, a charming waitress to attend to customers' needs, and a janitor to clean up the messes left behind.

Unleash your creative side by customizing your tavern to perfection! Deck out your place with the finest furniture, hang beautiful paintings on the walls, display epic trophies, and more. Your tavern is a canvas, and you are the artist – create an atmosphere that keeps customers coming back for more!

Brace yourself for even greater possibilities! Elevate your tavern empire by acquiring an additional establishment – a larger, more extravagant tavern that can host an even greater influx of guests and offer exciting new opportunities!


PLEASE NOTE: we're currently in the early access phase, which means we're still cooking up some awesome features and mechanics. Your feedback is like gold to us, so don't hesitate to drop your thoughts in our Discord community. We're all ears and can't wait to make this game even more amazing with your input!

changelog.change_log: fix NPC don't fight in the first tavern. Stop spawn Halloween NPC

Added Decor System
Remastered Maps
Added new guests: halloween and special armored
Added new sound and visual effects

Added a new type of customers - guests who want to rent rooms for the night.

You can now find rentable rooms in the Warm Autumn Tavern!

Extra game progress slots are here, and you can even delete them if needed.

Fixed the hand stuck that was causing some awkward situations.

Tweaked the lighting in the taverns (brighter vibes now).

Customers won't vanish anymore if you place them on tables or bars. They gracefully get down from the furniture.

Moved around the bar order spots, so our waitress won't touch the barrel taps while taking orders.

 Solved the issue where visitors could fall through the floor and stopped spawning

Revamped the doors and upgraded their physics for a smoother swing.

Fixed the hiccup where visitors were moonwalking towards the tavern exit

Visitors can no longer leave mud on stairs
Increase Android API target level to 32

Fixed a bug where the player's amount of money did not increase after collecting a money pouch
 Fixed material bug with black overlay when opening the menu
 Fixed a bug where when buying a barrel in the tutorial, the visitor would order soup instead of a drink again
